DocAttribute.Name: OffsetValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of sequential points described relative to the basis curve. If the offsets do not span the full extent of the basis curve (e.g. if the list contains only one item), then the lateral and vertical offsets implicitly continue with the same value towards the head and tail of the basis curve.

DocAttribute.Name: Tag
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional identifier of the curve, which may be used to correlate points from a variable cross-section.
